author: amassari
msg: - When reallocating the string, make room for the NULL terminator
- rawBuffer() always add the NULL terminator
- transcode() relies on rawBuffer() to get a NULL-terminated string [jira# 1291]

author: amassari
msg: Take into account the fExpandEntityReferences setting [jira# 1303]

author: cargilld
msg: Make setInputBufferSize virtual.  Fix from Christian Will.

author: cargilld
msg: Fix problem with hexbin::decode and use XMLByte instead of XMLCh for output of decoding.

author: knoaman
msg: DOM L3: pass schema normalized value only when datatype-normalization feature
